channel.title: Rage-Scape 317 - 24 Skills - Many Quests - 10+ Minigames - Economy
channel.description:
The download link can be found here: [url=http://www.Rage-Scape.com/Rage-ScapeClient.zip]www.Rage-Scape.com/Rage-ScapeClient.zip[/url] The forum link is: [url=http://www.Rage-Scape.com/forums/]Rage-Scape[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.Rage-Scape.com/play/]Rage-Scape[/url]
Bringing back the memories of my old server Rune-World
Some Features:
Skills: Perfect combat All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc Skilling arena to help you level up Ancient and lunar magic Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil 100% working range and magic Great leveling up Double XP events Real pking and drops, just like Runescape!
Minigames:
(NEW) Onslaught (NEW) Zombies Pyramid Plunder Domination Tower Barrows Pest Control Duel Arena Castle Wars Tzhaar Fight Caves Tzhaar Fight Pits Barbarian Assault Warrior's Guild
Monsters: Frost Dragons Complete GWD, with all 4 gods Giant Mole, with real burrowing Strykywerms Tormented Demons Kalphite Queen KBD Daggonoth Kings Chaos Elemental Everlasting Nomad Corporal Beast Dungeoneering Monsters Complete Brimhaven Dungeon Complete Taverly Dungeon Complete Slayer Tower Complete Varrock Sewers 100+ Other Spawned NPC's to be trained on.
Items: ALL Chaotic Weapons Extreme Potions Royal Torva Dicing and Gambling Few Customs Dragon Claws Koraski Ceremonial Colored Whips ALL THE NEW ITEMS ON RUNESCAPE
Others: Fully working clan chat Epic pets to use Unique Donator system Beautiful interfaces and the classic combat with no EoC shit Many Quests to use Tons of areas to explore Flowing economy
Pictures: [img]http://i.imgur.com/bpDgM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gXB6k.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uoDsj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4w9Vx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lH51S.png[/img]

Um, no xD This has been worked on for a whole year. anyways nice try , and time nice to see you

item.description:
@hottys2good4 wrote:

The download link can be found here: www.Rage-Scape.com/Rage-ScapeClient.zip
The forum link is: Rage-Scape
Webclient: Rage-Scape

Bringing back the memories of my old server Rune-World

Some Features:

Skills:
Perfect combat
All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc
Skilling arena to help you level up
Ancient and lunar magic
Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil
100% working range and magic
Great leveling up
Double XP events
Real pking and drops, just like Runescape!

Minigames:

(NEW) Onslaught
(NEW) Zombies
Pyramid Plunder
Domination Tower
Barrows
Pest Control
Duel Arena
Castle Wars
Tzhaar Fight Caves
Tzhaar Fight Pits
Barbarian Assault
Warrior’s Guild

Monsters:
Frost Dragons
Complete GWD, with all 4 gods
Giant Mole, with real burrowing
Strykywerms
Tormented Demons
Kalphite Queen
KBD
Daggonoth Kings
Chaos Elemental
Everlasting
Nomad
Corporal Beast
Dungeoneering Monsters
Complete Brimhaven Dungeon
Complete Taverly Dungeon
Complete Slayer Tower
Complete Varrock Sewers
100+ Other Spawned NPC’s to be trained on.

Items:
ALL Chaotic Weapons
Extreme Potions
Royal
Torva
Dicing and Gambling
Few Customs
Dragon Claws
Koraski
Ceremonial
Colored Whips
ALL THE NEW ITEMS ON RUNESCAPE

Others:
Fully working clan chat
Epic pets to use
Unique Donator system
Beautiful interfaces and the classic combat with no EoC shit
Many Quests to use
Tons of areas to explore
Flowing economy
